steps.title: Select Lambo doors that are compatible with the make and model of your car.
steps.content: Select Lambo doors that are compatible with the make and model of your car. [2] X Research source Be sure to ask the dealer who sells the doors what kit and tools you will need for installation.

steps.title: Gather the tools that you will need according to your Lambo door kit instructions.
steps.content: Gather the tools that you will need according to your Lambo door kit instructions. Remember that the tools needed for each kit will vary based on the type of vehicle you have.

steps.title: Remove the necessary parts according to the instructions for your particular kit.
steps.content: Remove the necessary parts according to the instructions for your particular kit.

steps.title: Take out the stock door stopper to gain access to the door's inner mechanisms.
steps.content: Take out the stock door stopper to gain access to the door's inner mechanisms.

steps.title: Close, lock and tape your door shut while installing the Lambo door kit.
steps.content: Close, lock and tape your door shut while installing the Lambo door kit.

steps.title: Remove all necessary items such as stock hinges, metal tabs and rubber casings keeping in mind that each car will vary.
steps.content: Remove all necessary items such as stock hinges, metal tabs and rubber casings keeping in mind that each car will vary. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Cut and roll the fender based on your kit's instructions.
steps.content: Cut and roll the fender based on your kit's instructions.

steps.title: Install your Lambo door kit hinges.
steps.content: Install your Lambo door kit hinges. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Add the Lambo door kit shock absorbers, which will make your new doors operate properly.
steps.content: Add the Lambo door kit shock absorbers, which will make your new doors operate properly.

steps.title: Tighten all bolts and screws securely.
steps.content: Tighten all bolts and screws securely.

steps.title: Try out your Lambo door to make sure it operates correctly.
steps.content: Try out your Lambo door to make sure it operates correctly.

steps.title: Make any necessary adjustments to your Lambo door to ensure that it fits and operates properly.
steps.content: Make any necessary adjustments to your Lambo door to ensure that it fits and operates properly. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Repeat the same process on the other side of your car.
steps.content: Repeat the same process on the other side of your car.
